text: <@U010D3MDKFH> Hi Anthony! If you go to the design manager and create a new 'HTML & HUBL' template and select 'Email' as the 'Template Type' it will pre-populate with the basic HTML and HUBL tags required to make a HubSpot email template. This might be a useful starting point?
Thank you, yes. I found my own way there yesterday. Going to try and figure out partials and modules today.
Hello! I'm a freelance web developer and digital marketer from the UK.
Anyone help setting up the free CMS developer account to learn and build on?
Hey Lee! I would check out <https://designers.HubSpot.com/tutorials/getting-started> to get started on the HubSpot CMS. You can spin up a Free CMS Developer Sandbox from this tutorial
ooops thought that would give me a new line. The link just takes me to log in to my account on the hubs page but I don't see anywhere for setting up the CMS sandbox?
Yea, we are working on fixing this - In the "Your accounts" screen, click the "Create a new, fresh account" button at the bottom.

Hey, I'm trying to get my Developer certifcate. I just got a reply that I didn't pass the practicum assigment. Anyone knows if there is feedback available anywhere? Can't really see which requirement I didn't fulfill...
You mean "create account with a new user"?
